## hpr4039 :: 3 ways to keep up with Youtube Channels

 YT 3 ways

Watch everything - subscribe
Watch some - RSS reader
binge a topic - moonmoon

RSS Bridge
https://github.com/RSS-Bridge/rss-bridge
http://lamp.local.lan/rss-bridge/?action=display&bridge=YoutubeBridge&context=By+custom+name&custom=%40BenEater&duration_min=&duration_max=&format=Html
http://lamp.local.lan/rss-bridge/?action=display&bridge=YoutubeBridge&context=By+username&u=cnn&duration_min=&duration_max=&format=Html
planets

http://fedoraplanet.org/
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Planet

moonmoon

http://moonmoon.org/
https://github.com/moonmoon/moonmoon
